sendLocation: Send us your address so we can ship your orders quickly. You can also set the location manually
errorLocating: There was an error locating your location, please try again
errorText: An error occurred, please try again later
errorExcelCatalogRowText: There are errors in rows {errorData} on the Catalog sheet in your excel file
errorExcelSubcatalogRowText: There are errors in rows {errorData} on the SubCatalog sheet in your excel file
errorExcelProductRowText: There are errors in rows {errorData} on the Product sheet in your excel file
errorExcelWarningText: Sheet and column names have been changed in your excel file. Please do not change the names and only add data
welcomeText: Dear Guests! 🌟 We are delighted to welcome you to our family restaurant, “Dilkash Shirin Taom”! 🍽️ Our restaurant is a blend of Turkish and European cuisine. We are ready to offer you warm hospitality and delicious dishes. 🌙 In our menu: • Over 120 national dishes 🍲 • More than 25 soup options 🍵 • Over 30 salads 🥗 We also offer food delivery service. 🚚 📞 Phone: 97 616 08 88 🕘 Order Time: 09:00 AM - 10:00 PM
sendMeContactBot: Send your contact to use the bot
sendContactMandatory: Send your contact to use the bot
aboutUsText: Dilkash Restaurant: 📱 Order by phone: +998976160888 📥 Online order: @dilkash_olmaliq 🚦 Working hours: 09:00-22:00 📍 Address: Olmaliq city, Primkulova Prospect (Landmark: Olmaliq Ministry of Defense Building)
rateService: Please rate the service quality from 1 to 5
rateFoods: Very good, now rate the quality of food
rateComment: Leave your comment as a message:
rateContact: Thanks for your feedback! We will do our best to resolve the situation! Please send us your phone number so we can contact you:

howManyPeopleDoYouBook: How many people are you booking for?
sendYourPhone: Send your phone number in international format to contact you. There should be no dashes or spaces between them. For example: +998991112233
bookingDetails: Are all the details correct? 📅 Order Date: {{bookingDate}} 🕒 Order Time: {{startTime}} - {{endTime}} 👤 Customer Name: {{customerName}} 👥 Number of People: {{numberOfPeople}} 📞 Contact Number: {{contactNumber}}
whoIsBookingEnterName:
In whose name are you booking?
Enter the name
deliveryWarningText:
Enter or send your phone number in the following format: +998 ** *** ** ** 
Note: If you plan to pay for the online order through Click or Payme, specify the phone number registered in the corresponding service
socialMediaText: You can also follow us on social media: 📱 Telegram: Dilkash Olmaliq 📸 Instagram: @dilkash.restaurant
startJobMessage: 👋 Would you like to become part of our professional team? 🏢 To start the job, please send your resume to the bot below, and we will reach out to you: 🔗 @rabotaDilkashBot We're looking forward to hearing from you! ✨
locationInfoAndChange: 📍 Your current location: {{address}} 📍 Select a new delivery address: 🔘 Use the Send my location button to share your location or enter the address manually. 🗺 Don't forget to confirm the address after entering it.
confirmAddress: ✅ Do you confirm this address? 🏠 Entered address: {{address}} If the address is correct, press Confirm, otherwise go back and re-enter the address.
enterCategoryName: Enter the name of the category in {{language}}:
sendCategoryImage: Very good! Submit your category picture now:
cannotUploadLotsPhoto: Sorry, cannot send more than 10 photos
must1Image: You must submit at least 1 image
whichCategory: Which category would you like to add to?
enterFoodName: Enter the name of the food in {{language}}:
enterFoodComposition:

enterFoodPrice:
Enter the meal price.
For example: 25000
sendFoodImages: Very good! Submit your food photos now:
newBookingMessage: {{customerName}} has booked a table 📅 👥 Number of people: {{numberOfPeople}} people 🕒 Booking time: {{timeRange}} 📅 Booking date: {{bookingDate}} 📞 Contact number: {{contactNumber}}
noBooking: There are currently no reservations available
selectCategories: Choose one of the categories below
cartText: 🛒 Your cart items: {{cartItems}} 🧾 Total quantity: {{totalQuantity}} items 🛵 Delivery: {{deliveryCost}} UZS 💰 Total price: {{totalPrice}} UZS
orderAddressInfo: 📍 Delivery Address: {{address}} ❓ Are you sure this address is correct? If needed, you can update it in the settings. 🔄 Providing the correct address ensures quick and smooth delivery service.
ordered: 📦 Your order number: #{{orderNumber}} is being processed! 📞 Please wait for a call from the operator. 🚚 We will deliver your order within 30 minutes. ☎️ Friendly delivery service: 97 616 08 88
enterOrderNumber: Please enter the order number. For example #123
cannotChangeStatus: The order has already been delivered or cancelled
errorChangingStatus: An error occurred while changing the order status
